All that, yes, plus KN-95 masks. I found them on Amazon. They're not N-95, but similar. Not as good as N-95 but much better than cloth or paper. The "K" means they're made and tested in China.  Their shape & material are more protective. I wear a KN-95 mask under my cloth mask.
